title: HEDYLOGOS
content:
HEDYLOGOS was the god of sweet-talk. He was one of the winged love-gods known as Erotes.

Hedylogos does not occur any extant literature but he does appear in at least one ancient vase painting
        (right) where he and Pothos (Longing) draw the chariot of the goddess Aphrodite.
